abstract: Fans of ABC’s “Lost” and “Good Morning America” – and perhaps executives at rival networks – may want to pay careful attention to an idea the Walt Disney Company plans to discuss at the Consumer Electronics Show on Thursday afternoon.
snippet: Fans of ABC’s “Lost” and “Good Morning America” – and perhaps executives at rival networks – may want to pay careful attention to an idea the Walt Disney Company plans to discuss at the Consumer Electronics Show on Thursday afternoon.
lead_paragraph: Fans of ABC’s “Lost” and “Good Morning America” – and perhaps executives at rival networks – may want to pay careful attention to an idea the Walt Disney Company plans to discuss at the Consumer Electronics Show Thursday afternoon.

abstract: The Walt Disney Company on Thursday confirmed its purchase of the television broadcast rights to two events for the coming inauguration of President-elect Barack Obama.
snippet: The Walt Disney Company on Thursday confirmed its purchase of the television broadcast rights to two events for the coming inauguration of President-elect Barack Obama.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company on Thursday confirmed its purchase of the television broadcast rights to two events for the coming inauguration of President-elect Barack Obama.

headline.main: ABC and Disney Channel to Televise Inauguration Events
